SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest

Class ProviderService

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.AbstractServiceImpl
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.ProviderService
@Component("ProviderService") @Path("/providerService/") @Produces("application/xml") public class ProviderService extends AbstractServiceImpl
REST service for providers-related operations using OAuth 1.0a authentication. This service provides endpoints for managing providers, retrieving providers information, and handling providers settings. It uses ScribeJava OAuth1 for authentication.
